metadata.title: CVE-2023-5871 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in libnbd, due to a malicious Network Block Device (NBD),a protocol for accessing Block Devices such as hard disks over a Network.This issue may allow a malicious NBD server to cause a Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnbd-bin - 1.20.0-1
libnbd-ocaml - 1.20.0-1
libnbd0 - 1.20.0-1
python3-libnbd - 1.20.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libnbd package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.20.0-1').
